p: Riven's abilities charge her blade, and her basic attacks expend charges to deal an additional damage.
q: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
w: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.
e: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
r: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.

blurd: Once a swordmaster in the warhosts of Noxus, Riven is an expatriate in a land she previously tried to conquer. She rose through the ranks on the strength of her conviction and brutal efficiency, and was rewarded with a legendary runic blade and a...
name: Riven
title: the Exile
